column5: OverviewThe Management MSc regularly ranks in the Financial Times Top 100 of Management MSc programmes in the World!We are a market leading Masters in Management, with a focus on working closely with our students to help them secure their ideal career post-graduation.You will study a packed programme of tailored modules all designed to bring you the latest thinking in strategy, accounting, sustainability, operations management, marketing, leadership, organisational management and business analytics.You can also tailor your studies to suit your interests and
